generated_text:
{
  "title": "Rice Rogies",
  "serving_size": 4,
  "ingredients": {
    "Garlic": "4 cloves minced",
    "Carrots": "2 medium diced",
    "Celery": "2 stalks diced",
    "Chicken": "2 cups cooked and shredded",
    "Olive Oil": "2 tbsp",
    "Cumin": "1 tsp",
    "Salt": "1 tsp",
    "Pepper": "1/2 tsp",
    "White Rice": "1 cup uncooked",
    "Chicken Broth": "2 cups",
    "Parsley": "2 tbsp chopped",
    "Lemon": "1 sliced for garnish"
  },
  "instructions": {
    "1": "Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.",
    "2": "Add garlic, carrots, and celery. Cook for 5 minutes or until vegetables are tender.",
    "3": "Stir in shredded chicken, cumin, salt, and pepper. Cook for another 2 minutes.",
    "4": "Add rice and chicken broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and cover. Simmer for 20 minutes or until rice is cooked.",
    "5": "Fluff rice with a fork and stir in parsley.",
    "6": "Serve hot with a slice of lemon on top."
  }
}
